title: Where is my ip?
body: I always have this problem where is says i have IP, i log off come back on and I've lost a portion of it, then i play a game and my ip is equal to the amount i would be at if i had my old balance before the game. ples hilp rito.

replies.body:
This is a bug that occurs in the Beta Client for some players. You should be able to resolve this by swapping over to the Legacy Client (from login) to visit the store and force a sync of you IP Balance.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

Let me know if this worked.

Sometimes, after a purchase, the store doesnt update that you spent IP, so it still displays that you have a certain amount, which you don't have. After you log back in, it probably re-updates. I have encountered this many times, but It seems to fix itself after i log back in/or i do another game.
Not what im talking about but thank you for trying to help.
